description: This file contains the implementation of Polymer's core JavaScript framework, including component registration, rendering status management, attribute serialization, behavior handling, and module management, embedded within an HTML script tag.

classes.name: Polymer.Base
classes.description: Core prototype for Polymer elements, providing lifecycle callbacks, property management, behavior handling, and attribute serialization.

classes.name: Polymer.RenderStatus
classes.description: Manages the rendering lifecycle, including readiness callbacks and next-render queue.

classes.name: Polymer.ImportStatus
classes.description: Alias for RenderStatus, indicating import loading status.

classes.name: Polymer.telemetry
classes.description: Tracks registration and instantiation metrics for Polymer components.

classes.name: DomModule
classes.description: Represents a DOM module for component registration and import management.

methods.name: resolve
methods.description: Removes the 'unresolved' attribute from document body to signal component readiness.

methods.name: Settings
methods.description: Determines Polymer configuration based on URL parameters and environment capabilities.

methods.name: registerCallback
methods.description: Registers lifecycle callbacks for Polymer elements.

methods.name: createdCallback
methods.description: Initialization logic when a Polymer element is created.

methods.name: attachedCallback
methods.description: Logic executed when a Polymer element is attached to the DOM.

methods.name: detachedCallback
methods.description: Logic executed when a Polymer element is detached from the DOM.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles attribute changes on Polymer elements.

methods.name: extend
methods.description: Extends a prototype with properties from another object.

methods.name: mixin
methods.description: Mixes properties from source into target object.

methods.name: serializeValueToAttribute
methods.description: Serializes a property value to a DOM attribute.

methods.name: deserialize
methods.description: Converts attribute string values back to property types.

methods.name: serialize
methods.description: Serializes a property value to a string for attribute setting.

methods.name: debounce
methods.description: Debounces a callback to limit invocation frequency.

methods.name: isDebouncerActive
methods.description: Checks if a debouncer is active.

methods.name: flushDebouncer
methods.description: Immediately executes a debounced callback.

methods.name: cancelDebouncer
methods.description: Cancels a pending debounced callback.

methods.name: _registerFeatures
methods.description: Prepares element features such as is, behaviors, constructor, and property info.

methods.name: _prepIs
methods.description: Prepares the element's 'is' property based on DOM module.

methods.name: _desugarSomeBehaviors
methods.description: Processes behaviors list, flattening and applying mixins.

methods.name: _flattenBehaviorsList
methods.description: Flattens nested behaviors array.

methods.name: _mixinBehavior
methods.description: Mixes a behavior into the element prototype.

methods.name: _marshalHostAttributes
methods.description: Applies host attributes to the element.

methods.name: _applyAttributes
methods.description: Sets attributes on a node based on a properties object.

methods.name: _takeAttributesToModel
methods.description: Copies DOM attributes to element properties.

methods.name: _setAttributeToProperty
methods.description: Sets a property based on an attribute value.

methods.name: serializeValueToAttribute
methods.description: Converts a property value to attribute string.

methods.name: deserialize
methods.description: Converts attribute string to property value based on type.
